# Show difference between `<-` and `=`

```{r}
# Objects colors, numbers, and letters are not created
data.frame(colors = c("red", "green"),
           numbers = c(1, 2),
           letters = c("A", "B"))

# Objects colors, numbers, and letters ARE creates
data.frame(colors <- c("red", "green"),
           numbers <- c(1, 2),
           letters <- c("A", "B"))
```


# Pipelines

```{r}
data_lionfish |> 
  _[data_lionfish$site == "Canones", ] |>
  _[data_lionfish$size_class == "large", ] |> 
  lm(log(total_weight_gr) ~ log(total_length_mm) , data = _) |>
  summary()
```

```{r}
data_milton |> 
  _[ , ] |> 
  cor.test(formula =  ~ wind_speed + pressure, data = _)
```
